website_summaries.verdict: Choose this Kettle Brand variety if you want to experience a uniquely hot flavor, but prefer to purchase a single bag to give it a try without committing to a multi-pack.
pros: Consumers who love hot and spicy foods can't get enough of these chips' Sriracha flavor that delivers balanced heat
8.5-ounce bag is perfect for giving this unique flavor a try
cons: Not everyone will like the flavor
but those who do, rave about the spicy seasoning

customer_reviews.title: Spicy and slightly sweet chips
customer_reviews.text: If you're a fan of sriracha, you won't be disappointed. Main warning is that if you don't pre-portion these chips and eat them straight out of the bag, you may find that you eat more than you planned. Not necessarily a bad thing, except for the fat and salt content is pretty high. Very highly recommended for spicy potato chip lovers.
customer_reviews.author: Debra E Brady

customer_reviews.title: Didn't really taste Srirachaey
customer_reviews.text: These weren't all that hot and didn't taste like Sriracha in the slightest. It was an interesting flavor but I won't be getting them again. If anything maybe spicy ketchup or close to something like that.
customer_reviews.author: Jackolope

customer_reviews.title: Not a lot of calories and if you like, spicy, buy overwhelming  so!
customer_reviews.text: Since I cannot taste or smell ( multiple sclerosis), I can only say this should have been hotter! Tho, if you do not wish hot and spicy, you are in for a favorite treat!
customer_reviews.author: Susan Wambsganz

customer_reviews.title: Tasty!
customer_reviews.text: Almost tastes like BBQ chips, but gets a little spicier the more you eat them. Good flavor tho
customer_reviews.author: Tweet

customer_reviews.title: Hot but delicious
customer_reviews.text: Hot but delicious. Too hot for my husband so more for me!
customer_reviews.author: froglady3

customer_reviews.title: Stale
customer_reviews.text: I have ordered these chips before. This time they were extremely stale. So disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: DK

customer_reviews.title: The Hot & Sweet of these Sriracha Chips are Great!
customer_reviews.text: I love this flavor! Yeah. It's a wee bit hot at first, but the heat dissipates quickly. My problem is that they're too addictive for me.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Torpey

customer_reviews.title: Nice.
customer_reviews.text: I thought I would like much better than I did. Fantastic chip but not as good as the Jalapeno chip.
customer_reviews.author: Philocrates

customer_reviews.title: My mom loves the kettle cooked chips so I used ...
customer_reviews.text: My mom loves the kettle cooked chips so I used Amazon to get her a variety of chips and she LOVES them!!!
customer_reviews.author: KennGin

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: so good, and of course i can't find them in any grocery store. will buy again.
customer_reviews.author: peach.

customer_reviews.title: More like a spicy BBQ flavor
customer_reviews.text: These are delicious, but not that hot. More like a spicy BBQ flavor. My 3 year old daughter eats them no problem.
customer_reviews.author: NJ

customer_reviews.title: My middle schooler's favorite snack. Just wish the company had a baked ...
customer_reviews.text: My middle schooler's favorite snack. Just wish the company had a baked version.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good but can be spicier for my perference. Textures great.
customer_reviews.author: MJ

customer_reviews.title: Hot damn good
customer_reviews.text: Love them! My supermarket stopped selling them idk why?! They are best kettle chips ever!!!
customer_reviews.author: Colleen Mcskimming

customer_reviews.title: Tasty
customer_reviews.text: If it was spicier would get 5 stars. But 😋 yummy.
customer_reviews.author: pupsmumm

customer_reviews.title: Greasy bottom
customer_reviews.text: I like the chips but it gets really greasy at the bottom of the bag.
customer_reviews.author: Victor Arief Sugiharto

customer_reviews.title: Amazing taste
customer_reviews.text: I Love them very much, amazing tasteful snack. Had them for the first time at a business meeting and I had to go home research them so I can order them. They are not hot at all.
customer_reviews.author: kiara H.

product_meta.title: Kettle Brand Potato Chips, Sriracha, 8.5 Ounce
product_meta.description:
Flavor Name:SrirachaOur flavor experts have done it again. This bold flavor is everything you love about the hot sauce on a chip. The combination of chili, garlic, and vinegar creates the authentic taste of the real deal, and is made with all-natural ingredients.




PRODUCT DETAILS
Flavor Name:Sriracha * Package Dimensions :12.35 x 7.5 x 3.4 inches; 9.14 Ounces
 * Item model number :104840
 * Date First Available :April 15, 2020
 * Manufacturer :Snyder's-Lance, Inc.
 * ASIN :B01INGNXZQ

The combination of chili, garlic, and vinegar creates the authentic taste of the real deal, and is made with all-natural ingredients.
feature_bullets: This bold flavor is everything you love about Sriracha hot sauce on a chip
The combination of chili, garlic, and vinegar creates the authentic taste of the real deal, and is made with all natural ingredients
Made with natural ingredients, Non GMO Project Verified
No trans fat or preservatives; Gluten free; Certified Kosher
8.5 ounce bag is perfect for sharing at parties, picnics, or just snacking at home
